entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: HttpRequestMessage.CustomMetricsTags #86281
  • Test failure: System.Buffers.Text.Tests.FormatterTests.TestFormatterSingle #86275
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] [tvOS] Failed to boot Apple TV: Unable to boot the Simulator #86274
  • Assertion failed: (GetComponentSize() <= 2) || IsArray() #86273
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128 API's on Amd64 with mini JIT #86272
  • [6.0] [Android] CI failure: Interop_DllImportSearchPaths - Non-success instrumentation exit code: 101, expected: 100 #86271
  • Test failure: _Avx512F_VL_Vector128_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F_VL_Vector128.Program.ShiftRightArithmeticInt641() #86267
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Vectorization/UnrollEqualsStartsWIth/UnrollEqualsStartsWIth.dll #86265
    8.0.0
  • [mono] FullAOT compilation of Microsoft.iOS.dll crashes with managed static registrar #86264
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b539509/b539509/b539509.dll #86263
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite failing #86262
  • .net7 HRESULT: 0x8007000E on linux with read-only fs #86259
  • superpmi-collect failing because MicroBenchmarks builds are failing #86258
  • tracing.runtimeeventsource times out with PGO enabled and R2R disabled #86253
    8.0.0
  • [iOS] System.Diagnostics.Process is not supported #86251
  • Add test for successfully matching current RID when reading an empty RID graph #86250
  • Directory.Delete(path, recursive: true) fails on directories containing junctions #86249
  • Add environment variables that enable to trust additional certificates from the file system. #86243
  • Linking an empty .NET MAUI app produces inconsistent binaries #86242
  • Should `PipeWriter.FlushAsync` throw if called after `PipeWriter.Complete`? #86239
  • Guarded devirtualization based on whole program view #86235
    8.0.0
  • Test failure _Vector64_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector64.Program.WidenInt64() #86234
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #86233
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\typeequivalence\\simple\\Simple\\Simple.cmd #86232

Closed

  • Move ILLink.RoslynAnalyzer.Tests.Generator to be an IIncrementalGenerator-based source generator #86190
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 5/2/2023 10:35:24 AM #85987
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.AccessControl relies on deprecated package System.Security.Principal.Windows #86236
  • Add tests for src generated IServiceCollection.Configure implementations #83621
    8.0.0
  • [Breaking Change] Change CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap to only unwrap wrappers from the target ComWrappers instance #86189
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #84813
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #85213
    8.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #86134
    8.0.0
  • jitstress: BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd failing #85261
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.AesGcm - decryption allows truncated tags #71366
    8.0.0
  • Memory usage reported by the process greatly mismatches the dump #85948
    8.0.0
  • DLLs created by Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator are built in debug mode #77136
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/SSA/MemorySsa/MemorySsa.sh #86231
  • When reflecting abstruct proterty in interface, "BadImageFormatException: Bad IL format" will be thrown. #86141
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #80447
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #81105
    8.0.0
  • Bump ICU to version 72 #80721
    8.0.0
  • fatal error LNK1295: '/INCREMENTAL' not compatible with '/DEBUGTYPE' specification... #64082
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Tests.HttpWebRequestTest_Sync.GetResponseAsync_ParametersAreCachableButDifferent_CreateNewClient #85436
    8.0.0
  • error when build native aot with selenium dotnet 7 #86202
  • SEHException (0x80004005): External component has thrown an exception #85231

PullRequests

Created

  • Support remaining collections in config binder generator #86285
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.18 #86284
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Write the generated file header to the ComInterfaceGenerator-generated files #86283
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part. #86282
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-staging] add RID for Alpine 3.18 #86280
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stop testing UnregisterFrozenSegment #86279
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [draft][browser] threads experiment #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove Architecture Property #86277
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Disable DllImportSearchPathsTest and StartupHookTests on mobile #86269
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] WBT: Re-enable blazor run test #86268
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Prevent memory corruption when decoding UCO entry point #86266
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add -DCLI_CMAKE_FALLBACK_OS in CMakeSettings.json #86261
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Special-case array/list/ReadOnlyDictionary in Dictionary(IEnumerable, …) ctors #86254
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Dynamic heap count #86245
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix floating-point args passing #86244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Do interface dispatch through a helper #86238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Move assignment rationalization to before forward substitution #86004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Move jiterpreter tables to new file; Add draft jiterpreter overview document #86270
    area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Incremental generator for illink analyzer tests #86260
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • add RID for Alpine 3.18 #86276
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clean up impSpanEqualsOrStartsWith #86129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle the remainder in MemoryExtensions.Count vectorized #82687
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix new helper calls for some block copies involving promoted locals #86246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84443
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Suppress clang-16 warnings (backport #81573) #84444
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0.7
  • Delete some code around `ModuleList` #86230
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs (#58417) #84358
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • [debugger] Fix MDBGPROT_CMD_TYPE_ELEMENT_TYPE behavior #85679
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add Ubuntu Kinetic 22.10 and Mantic 23.10 RIDs #85912
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add extending conversions to PackedSimd #86252
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Fix HTTP/3 and HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85977
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Fix HTTTP/2 header decoder buffer allocation #85976
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Update offsets-tool python clang binding so it works with newer clang #86256
    area-Build-mono
  • Specify NUnit test runner for illink tests #86187
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Change CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap to be ComWrappers-instance-specific #86195
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocking, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Fix EventPipe shutdown logic #86180
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Always expand cctor helpers for NAOT #86147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement AesGcm constructors accepting a tag size and obsolete the existing ones #86211
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use /INCREMENTAL:NO for Debug #86170
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Reenable AOTing System.Net.Quic.dll in Mono AOT runtime tests #86247
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • In Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator targets, respect Optimize property. #82374
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [browser] disable enablePerfMeasure by default #86237
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix Console.ForegroundColor usage in NativeRuntimeEventSourceTest #86248
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Assist JIT in eliminating bounds checks #81036
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Disable SslStreamSniTest.UnencodedHostName_ValidatesCertificate on Android #86241
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Reduce overhead of calling into SearchValues #86046
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • link to the latest version of Framework Design Guidelines #86216
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Show method names in JitDisasm #86060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Fix asset loading in boot config scenario #86240
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Run fgValueNumberConstLoad for invariant loads #86154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add fp <--> int conversions to PackedSimd #86143
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Delete `GT_ASG` #85871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix warnings found with CA1861 Avoid constant arrays as arguments #86229
    area-Meta
  • MetricEventSource tests workaround .NET Framework double rounding #86286
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Intrinsics analyzer and fixes #85481
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix WaitForExitAsync could return a cancelled task #85882
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Isolating JITDbl2Ulng helper changes #86175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add marshallers for GeneratedComInterface-based types #86177
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clean up dead code in illink targets #85741
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Unmark loop align regardless if we found block to align or not #86198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimized conversions between `Half` and `Single`. #81632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve the handling of ToScalar and GetElement(0) #86209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add version info to NativeAOT apps #79623
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Restructure WellKnownOids.cs #84921
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, size-reduction
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2/r2rdump for LA64. #85038
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Convert JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests to a merged test group #85847
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part (backport #84413) #84442
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow wildcards when looking for nodes #82386
    no-recent-activity, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • [Draft] Limit length of System.Runtime.BigInteger to int.MaxValue-32 bits #84901
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement `ToggleBit` #83400
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 6 #84983
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Fix for incorrect release of CCW holder #84927
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update System.CommandLine version #84229
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • POC for HttpRequestException error codes #82399
    NO-MERGE
  • Add option to decrypt Quic traffic in debug builds #83001
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • PipeReader.CopyToAsync(Stream) should not perform zero-length writes #85768
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Remove Vector<T> fallbacks for Vector128<T> #85916
    area-System.Memory
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • GetChromeVersions task: Try to find older versions, if the latest one is #86184
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #86048
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable getting command line from host during suspension #86116
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add pre-built detection #86151
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Adopt Microsoft.DotNet.XunitAssert fork #86193
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid calling Encoding.GetBytes when Vector128 is not hardware accelerated #85267
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector128/256/512.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Add ToDictionary() overloads for KeyValuePair and ValueTuple kv. #85811
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Enable runtime tests on Interpreter #86097
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [OSX] HybridGlobalization implement compare native function #85965
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • JIT: Intrinsify UTF16->UTF8 conversion for string literals (Encoding.UTF8.TryGetBytes) #85328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move ternlog recognition to lower #86228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Make host look for RID-specific assets via a known list by default #84100
    breaking-change, area-Host, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • JIT: Add a pass of liveness for the new locals inside physical promotion #86043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • enable TieredPGO by default #86225
    NO-MERGE, area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • [Wasm] Adjust error message for .NET 7 assemblies, JSExport and multi-threading #86197
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [WIP] Honor virtual memory limit #80295
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Use Unsafe.BitCast in AnyNSearchValues<T, TImpl> types #85868
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use `NativeMemory` in `System.Data.Odbc` #85966
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • avoid ProtocolToken allocations in TLS handshake #86163
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix lint issues #86155
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable v128 in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [browser] Load appsettings to VFS #85520
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    blocked, os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191

  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` set flag in SDK #85245

  • [mono][aot] Enabling AOT wrappers for virtual delegates #85643
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512

  • [mono][jit] Enable Vector64 support on arm64 in jit mode. #86188

  • Expose DOTNET_JitPrintInlinedMethods in Release #84606
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Exception handling: outstanding tasks #2169

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement unhandled exception handling #2274

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Build for wasi sdk #2268
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable static access expansion #2271
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Simplify code to use struct layouts #2273

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Wasm separate DWARF debug to different file #2264
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Prepare the compiler for multithreaded execution #2272

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 Preview 5: Android Release builds no longer work #32539

Closed

  • $(TargetVersionFramework) is empty when using <TargetVersionFrameworks> #32536

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32541
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Enable documentation files in GenAPI & APICompat #32530
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Create README.md for CTLs #32529
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Convert the DotnetCommand that call "new" to DotnetNewCommand #32517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update to 7.0.304 #32537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add warning for optional workload EOL #32426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try installing wasm-tools from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink
  • [release/7.0.4xx] corrected strings in containers #32456
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #32447
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove Cli integration tests which are migrated to dotnet/templating #32477
    untriaged

Updated

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Support side by side workload manifests in SDK resolver #32471
    untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] removed restriction on Publish SDK to allow publishing non-web project #32422
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] support correct property name and ensure compat with old name #32085
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Default all containers to linux instead of the current SDK's OS #32473
    Area-Containers
  • [release/7.0.3xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32375
    Servicing-consider, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [API proposal] Attribute for passing caller identity implicitly #4984
    Needs More Work

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide a per-user option to ignore TreatWarningsAsErrors #68196
  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unexpected value 'PropertyAccess' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.BoundKind' #68194
  • Remove Unused References does not work for .NET Standard 2.0 project although it uses the new csproj format #68189
  • Intellisense "contains" not working fine! #68188
    17.7

Closed

  • Need Feature/AB flag for Document-Outline. #68192
  • Rename UI: highlighting span doesn't shrink when the new name is shorter #65299
    17.5
  • Formatted output is lexically different from the input. #68187
  • Retrieving new line formatting option #68185
  • UI/interaction issues still present in Document Outline. #67264
    Next
  • Document Outline VS2022 17.4 show "hard to watch" tree node when member's class are inline #66473
    Next
  • Enums don't nest in Document Outline depending on formatting #66012
    Next
  • the tree-view resets to the top whenever the model is updated, making is so you lose your place in the tree. #68103
    Next
  • As you navigate in a file, the selected item in the view will be updated, but will not scroll into view. So finding that item is extremely challenging (in large files). #68102
    Next
  • Sort state is not preserved across VS sessions. #68100
    Next
  • SearchBar lacks history, as well as normal `x` adornment to clear the search #68098
    Next
  • Sort buttons do not show their state, making it unclear what the current sorting state is #68096
    Next
  • Document Outline for C#: selected sort is lost when switching document #63859
    Next
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67592

PullRequests

Created

  • Initial support for dictionary collection literals #68197
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Validate InlineArrayAttribute applications on types in source. #68195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Draft "Use net8.0 runtime for InlineArray tests" #68190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Update interceptors branch from latest main #68182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Enable document outline by default #68088
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Only do LOC for 17.6 #68181
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement compile-time boundary checks around inline arrays access. #68178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68106
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Update compiler tool set version in 17.5 #68180
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix detection of nested symbols in Document Outline #68107
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline, Next
  • Use a proper tool bar in Document Outline #68094
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline, Next
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68114
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Deprecate CompilationWithAnalyzers.IsDiagnosticAnalyzerSuppressed public API #67671
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics, Next

Updated

  • Sync C# required members implementation with VB changes #68200
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #68199

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FormPipeReader modifies the readonly input buffer #48251
  • Optimize DefaultHubLifetimeManager.OnDisconnectedAsync when there are thousands of unsubscribed groups #48249
  • Make RDG handle names that are escaped keywords #48248
  • Default EventSourceSupport to true in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #48247
    8.0-preview5
  • InputText with a property that has a MaxLength data annotation should generate a maxlength attribute #48246
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #48245
  • FileBufferingReadStream CopyToAsync Performance problem when wrapped #48242
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery triggers OnParametersSet after Navigation using AuthorizeRouteView #48241
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Memory leak in Health Checks #48240
  • Signalr: Request for Optimized Client-Server Communication #48239
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware: Unique ID for Request/Response #48235

Closed

  • RDG does not support certain `RouteHandlerBuilder` extension methods #47196
    8.0-preview5
  • Pass JsonSerializerOptions to `ReadFromJsonAsync` calls in RDG #47145
    8.0-preview5
  • Optimize how EmitterContext is constructed in RDG #47147
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Exception thrown during Hot Reload #47926
  • Tab Switching leads to delay in content disposal #48036
  • asp.net mvc An unhandled exception occurred while processing the reques #48046
  • Blazor server Cascading Value refreshed wrong #48223
  • Blazor CSP - Directive unsafe-inline for styles #48204
  • Change access modifier of ForceSignOut() to protected virtual for improved extensibility and custom exception handling #48101
  • JavaScript interop calls cannot be issued at this time. This is because the circuit has disconnected and is being disposed #48220
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #48222
  • Perf regression: mapaction #48231

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for IResults with explicit interface implementations #48250
    area-web-frameworks
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #48243
    area-infrastructure
  • Change API template to only use Invariant Globalization in Native AOT… #48238
    area-mvc
  • Avoid delegate shuffle thunks in StringUtilities #48234
    area-runtime

Updated

  • Allow declaring render modes, and emit the corresponding markers into HTML #48190
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Add IHttpSysRequestTimingFeature to support accessing http.sys timing info #48218
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove rules associated with the auto-merge label #48227
    area-infrastructure
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    needs-area-label
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
    area-mvc
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem With MAUI and Angular in Visual 22 #15097
  • NavigationPage.ToolbarItems not shown on Android after Back key pressed #15096
  • [iOS] ContentViews and Grids not rendered properly in right-to-left cultures #15095
  • .NET MAUI App template not showing #15094
  • Grid row not sizing correctly with * when the content is a collectionview on iOS #15092
  • Android: InputTransparent adversely affects position or visibility of Labels. #15090
    Backlog
  • Android: text color in buttons in alert dialog and picker dialog for default theme has very low contrast in dark mode #15088
    Backlog
  • WinUI and iOS. InputTransparent does not work. #15087
    Backlog
  • WinUI. Auto-sized Grid row containing ScrollView containing a Rectangle ignores explicit HeightRequest on the Rectangle. #15086
    Backlog
  • Android 7.1, with FlyoutIsPresented = true , can't expand the shell #15081
    Backlog

Closed

  • MAUI uses `Panel` instead of `Grid` for Windows #15093
  • Emoji Issue on Windows #15077
  • Android7.1, 通过 FlyoutIsPresented = true ,无法展开Shell #15082
  • SearchBar is extremely laggy on physical device #9242
  • Inability to target or inspect MAUI elements by content-desc property #14940
  • ScrollView in Grid cell multiple issues on iOS, Android and WinUI. #15076
  • iOS. Auto-sized Grid row containing ScrollView sizes itself to the full height requested by the ScrollView content. #15085
    Backlog
  • CollectionView virtualization does not work when using a DataTemplateSelector #11272
    Backlog
  • why MAUI does not support watch face till now. #15084
  • Webview reloads initial url when app resumes on Android #14939
  • FlexLayout RowReverse doesn't work Properly #7756
  • MAUI Images not loading in VS 2022 17.5 - works in 17.4 (Unpackaged on Windows) #14942
  • Always have to close and restart VS between each new change #14943
  • MinVersion of TargetDeviceFamily not set correctly when TargetPlatformMinVersion is not set in project file #5890
    Backlog
  • [iOS] MinimumHeightRequest and MinimumWidthRequest are not working properly for View #7330
    Backlog
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException #14963
  • .NET MAUI - How to use Tablet running windows OS as debugging device #15080

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.14.2.1 to 4.15.1 #15089
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Adjust flex item position to account for reversal when laying out unconstrained #13936
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Use ReplaceMapping method to replace Window MapTitle method #15041
  • Clear out the renderer on VCR when disconnected #15036
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Use AppendToMapping for Focus commands #15040
  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Change the impl of the event handler to use a notification center to avoid circular refs. #15064
  • Handle Grid * expansion when size is larger than minimum, but less than sufficient to display full size #14902
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Fix up Compatibility gallery #15020
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Controls(Android): fix frame background color #14917
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
